price: 15 Un voile les privera donc, ce Jour-là, de la vision de leur Seigneur.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: kallā innahum ʿan rabbihim yawma-idhin lamaḥjūbūna
